definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control

sentences.english: Chapter five mainly restates the intention and signification of the thesis.
sentences.chinese: 第五章爲結束語，重申了本文的寫作目的和意義。

sentences.english: A brief theoretical discussion addressing those features appears in the conclusion of this series.
sentences.chinese: 結束語中將在理論上對這些特性進行簡要的討論。

sentences.english: Fifth chapter is the concluding remark, which is the future of our legislative proposal.
sentences.chinese: 第五章爲結束語，對我國未來立法的幾點建議。

sentences.english: This paper, except introduction and conclusion, is divided into five parts.
sentences.chinese: 本論文除導語和結束語外，共分爲五個部分。

sentences.english: In the conclusion some suggestions are proposed for the infrared study of solar magnetic fields in our country.
sentences.chinese: 結束語對我國的紅外太陽磁場研究提出一些建議。

sentences.english: End the closing with a comma.
This text has four chapters , prefaces and the summary.
sentences.chinese: 本文共四章還有引言和結束語。

sentences.english: The seventh part is brief peroration.
sentences.chinese: 第七部分是簡短的結束語。

sentences.english: The third part is the peroration .
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是本文的結束語。

sentences.english: Chapter Seven is the conclusion of this study.
sentences.chinese: 第七章是本論文的結束語。

sentences.english: Alright. So let me just say-- one second finishing words.
sentences.chinese: 好了，那就讓我說，最後一秒鐘結束語。

sentences.english: Which of the following endings are correct?
sentences.chinese: 以下哪幾個結束語是正確的？

sentences.english: End educational foreground in technology in language in elucidation in part in language.
sentences.chinese: 結束語部分說明語文科技教育的前景。

sentences.english: He summarized his main points in his peroration.
sentences.chinese: 他在結束語中總結了他的演講要點。

sentences.english: In the conclusion, the thesis reasserts its views.
sentences.chinese: 結束語部分簡要概括了本論文所要表明的觀點。

definition: lit. deal sincerely and fairly (idiom); frank and open-minded/plain speaking/Let's talk frankly and openly between ourselves./to put one's cards on the table
lit. so loud that even the deaf can hear (idiom); rousing even the apathetic
radical of a compound word (in European language)
to break a code/to crack a riddle/to solve an enigma/a breakthrough
vivid and colorful (idiom); true to life/lively and realistic
